item.description:
Hey, gang, the sap is running and I have a hankerin' to try some of that Suthun' BBQ I heard tell about up yonder in Putney, VT.

An unofficial road trip event (our first!) we are crossin' state lines in the name of good eatin'!

Take a look at some of these reviews and decide for yourself...

http://www.bbqpilgrim...

http://www.curtisbbqv...

http://www.roadfood.c...

no fee for this event, we will all just carpool or meet up there and enjoy together...

RSVP would be good so we can coordinate.

there's a map on the website (below), so we can all get lost together...

hope to see you there!
item.name: ROAD TRIP! Curtis' BBQ on Sunday in Putney, VT [Twixt & 'Tween]
